Key Match Events: Luke Weaver delivered a four-out save in his first playoff appearance
Clay Holmes got five outs in the middle innings, including a crucial out to end the sixth inning
Austin Wells hit an RBI single to tie the game in the bottom of the sixth inning
Alex Verdugo hit a run-scoring base hit to take the lead for the Yankees in the seventh inning
Pre-Game Insights: General manager Brian Cashman wanted to give Aaron Boone 'as many choices to navigate late-game action' at the trade deadline, despite Clay Holmes struggling as closer
Post-Match Reflections: Clay Holmes praised Luke Weaver's performance, saying 'what he's doing has been a huge boost for the team'
Aaron Boone said Luke Weaver was 'excellent' in his first playoff appearance, especially considering he had to face the top of the Kansas City lineup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees' bullpen pitched well down the stretch and will be tested in the postseason
Gerrit Cole was knocked around for five-plus innings and was replaced by Tim Hill
Others: The game was part of the ALDS and the Yankees took a 1-0 lead in the series
